title: #9: The People Vs. O. J. Simpson - BONUS EPISODE - Analyzing Two Letters By Nicole
description:
In this bonus episode, Laura Richards and Lisa Zambetti review two letters written by Nicole Brown Simpson to O. J. One is loving, the other is not and both are revealing.

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
